changeSet.author: pwadmore
changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbReportingSchema}.TIMESERIES_JOB', 'U') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbReportingSchema}.TIMESERIES_JOB', 'DATETIME2_TIMESERIES_JOB';

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbReportingSchema}.DATETIME2_TIMESERIES_JOB', 'U') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbReportingSchema}.DATETIME2_TIMESERIES_JOB', 'TIMESERIES_JOB';
